title: What are the contributions of indigenous Filipinos on medicine and how do you relate it to science and technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nothing. There’s no reason for somebody who doesn’t have any idea how one thing cures something. They just have a false sense of security. Let’s say, one is I’ll and forehead is swollen. There are lots of reasons why, and putting some leaves don’t help. They’ll think that by putting some leaves will cure them but no. And from there, there’s no linkage or connection to science and technology that ever happened.
